statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE DATE(date_submitted) = '2022-10-01'
SELECT id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT id, feedback, rating, product_id, customer_id, date_submitted FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 1
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3
SELECT product_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY max_rating DESC
SELECT product_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE helpful_votes > 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, customer_id FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 'c1978dc5-b561-44df-829a-7b9b42b468a9';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE product_id = '3e093f51-8d74-4e1f-b1d9-9264115d9892' AND helpful_votes > 10;
SELECT review_text, rating, customer_id FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews ORDER BY rating DESC, review_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM ServiceFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, comment FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, description FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM ServiceFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, price FROM services WHERE price > 50.00 AND price < 200.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';

SELECT customers_feedback.customer_name, feedback_tags.tag_name FROM customers_feedback INNER JOIN feedback_tags_mapping ON customers_feedback.id = feedback_tags_mapping.feedback_id INNER JOIN feedback_tags ON feedback_tags_mapping.tag_id = feedback_tags.tag_id WHERE feedback_tags.tag_name = 'Service' ORDER BY customers_feedback.customer_name ASC;
